org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions
Class P2P

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions.P2P
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class P2P
extends java.lang.Thread

Class P2P represents the P2P Mediator, a thread running on each site of the Grid able to "listen" to messages coming from both remote and local sites and to process them. This means that it has a queue, where such messages are stored, and that it uses one specific handler to cope with what is required by every specific kind of message it can receive.

By "local site" we mean the site on which the particular instance of P2P runs its thread.

Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Constructor Detail

P2P

public P2P(GridSite site)
Creates a new P2P within OptorSim.

Parameters:

Method Detail

acceptMessage

protected void acceptMessage(Message message)
Adds a Message to the queue and notifies it. This method is usually called within other threads.

Parameters:
message - the Message to be added to the queue.

run

public void run()
The run() method of the thread. It waits until any Message is received and then processes the messages in the queue until there are none left.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

sendMessage

protected void sendMessage(Message message,
                           GridSite site)
Sends a Message to another P2P.

Parameters:
message - the Message to be sent;
site - the site to which the message should be sent.

alreadyProcessed

public boolean alreadyProcessed(Auction auction)
Check if we have already seen a particular auction. If not, mark it as seen and return false

Parameters:
auction - The auction to check
Returns:
true if auction has already been processed, false if auction is new to this P2P

removeContact

public void removeContact(Auction auction)
Remove an Auction from the register of auctions which this P2P hss processed.

Parameters:
auction - The Auction which should be removed.

public GridSite getSite()

sendToLocalSBs

public void sendToLocalSBs(Message msg,
                           boolean includeOriginator)
Sends a message to all local SBs, possibly including the one that originated the auction

Parameters:
msg - The message to propagate
includeOriginator - whether to include the SB that originated the auction.

shutDownAllSBs

void shutDownAllSBs()
Tell a P2P mediator that it should ask all SBs to terminate. The method will wait for this to happen.

shutDownP2P

public void shutDownP2P()
Terminates the thread of this P2P and all the threads of the local StorageBrokers.
